body_html:
@jinghuangzhu for anyone intersted in using sequence example, here is a good example(for variable length image caption/ids)
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/im2txt/im2txt/data/build_mscoco_data.py
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/im2txt/im2txt/ops/inputs.py
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/im2txt/im2txt/show_and_tell_model.py
Greate demo code here
http://www.wildml.com/2016/08/rnns-in-tensorflow-a-practical-guide-and-undocumented-features/
